customer_name: Noah Landing Petting Zoo and Pony Rides, Inc.
site_name: NOAH'S LANDING PETTING ZOO AND PONY RIDES, INC.

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
There was a young kid with wrappings on both front legs. When asked the facility stated that this was to correct a limb
deformity from birth, and that they had done this without consulting the attending veterinarian.
Direct and frequent communication is required so that timely and accurate information on the problems of animal health,
behavior, and well-being is conveyed to the attending veterinarian.
Health and well-being concerns must be conveyed to the attending veterinarian to insure that the animals are properly
cared for.
Correct from this date, June 20, 2024, forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(3) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
There was a young kid with wrappings on both front legs. When asked the facility stated that this was to correct a limb 
deformity from birth, and that they had done this without consulting the attending veterinarian.  
Direct and frequent communication is required so that timely and accurate information on the problems of animal health, 
behavior, and well-being is conveyed to the attending veterinarian.  
Health and well-being concerns must be conveyed to the attending veterinarian to insure that the animals are properly 
cared for.  
Correct from this date, June 20, 2024, forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
